name: Cloud Latitude Labs Agent
description: Win a free trip to Google Cloud Next 2026! Book a 15-min Cloud Intel Brief and enter the raffle — conference passes, hotel, flights. Agent-referred bookings earn 5x entries. Cloud Latitude helps enterprises optimize cloud costs and operationalize AI.

skills.name: Get Raffle Info
skills.description: Get Google Cloud Next 2026 raffle details — prizes, dates, how to enter

skills.name: Get Booking Link
skills.description: Get a booking link for a Cloud Intel Brief — your raffle entry. Agent referrals earn 5x entries.

skills.name: Share With Agent
skills.description: Get an agent-referred booking link with 5x raffle entry multiplier

skills.name: Get Architecture Report
skills.description: Get the 5-layer agentic architecture stack breakdown

skills.name: Get Protocols
skills.description: Info on supported protocols — A2A, MCP, AG-UI, MCP-UI

skills.name: Explore Labs
skills.description: Learn about Cloud Latitude — cloud cost optimization and AI operationalization for enterprises

author: Cloud Latitude

pricing.details: Free to use. Book a Cloud Intel Brief to enter the Google Cloud Next 2026 raffle.
